mapper.select: SELECT E.EMP_NAME AS empName, E.EMP_NUM AS empNum, P.POS_NAME AS posName, D.DEPT_NAME AS deptName, COALESCE(V.VACATION_LEFTOVER_DATE, 0) AS vacationLeftoverDate FROM EMPLOYEE E JOIN POSITIONS P ON E.POS_NUM = P.POS_NUM JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON E.DEPT_NUM = D.DEPT_NUM LEFT JOIN VACATION V ON E.EMP_NUM = V.EMP_NUM LEFT JOIN VACATION_COUNT VC ON V.VACATION_NUM = VC.VACATION_NUM;

SELECT E.EMP_NAME , E.EMP_NUM , D.DEPT_NAME, P.POS_NAME , VC.CREATED_DATE , CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(VC.VACATION_START_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d'), ' ~ ', DATE_FORMAT(VC.VACATION_END_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d')) AS date, DATEDIFF(VC.VACATION_END_DATE, VC.VACATION_START_DATE) + 1 AS dating FROM EMPLOYEE E JOIN VACATION V ON E.EMP_NUM = V.EMP_NUM JOIN VACATION_COUNT VC ON V.VACATION_NUM = VC.VACATION_NUM JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON E.DEPT_NUM = D.DEPT_NUM JOIN POSITIONS P ON E.POS_NUM = P.POS_NUM;

SELECT E.EMP_NAME AS empName, E.EMP_NUM AS empNum, P.POS_NAME AS posName, VC.CREATED_DATE , D.DEPT_NAME AS deptName, COALESCE(V.VACATION_LEFTOVER_DATE, 0) AS vacationLeftoverDate FROM EMPLOYEE E JOIN POSITIONS P ON E.POS_NUM = P.POS_NUM JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON E.DEPT_NUM = D.DEPT_NUM LEFT JOIN VACATION V ON E.EMP_NUM = V.EMP_NUM LEFT JOIN VACATION_COUNT VC ON V.VACATION_NUM = VC.VACATION_NUM WHERE E.EMP_NUM = #{empNum};

SELECT E.EMP_NAME , E.EMP_NUM , D.DEPT_NAME, P.POS_NAME , VC.CREATED_DATE , CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(VC.VACATION_START_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d'), ' ~ ', DATE_FORMAT(VC.VACATION_END_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d')) AS date, DATEDIFF(VC.VACATION_END_DATE, VC.VACATION_START_DATE) + 1 AS dating FROM EMPLOYEE E JOIN VACATION V ON E.EMP_NUM = V.EMP_NUM JOIN VACATION_COUNT VC ON V.VACATION_NUM = VC.VACATION_NUM JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON E.DEPT_NUM = D.DEPT_NUM JOIN POSITIONS P ON E.POS_NUM = P.POS_NUM WHERE E.EMP_NUM = #{empNum};
